text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Uh, Gimlet…… Tazuna left a message for you. 
She wants you to come to the chairwoman's 
office later.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's probably about that fence 
you broke a while ago……

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Hmph, so Prospero beckons for me…… It appears that this'll be like sailing straight out into the tempest.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ?? Prospe-? Tempest? Umm, but it's Tazuna calling for you……?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
—— Tempest… It is true that Tazuna's 
reprimands… are fierce… as a storm.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you two…… I'm sure Tazuna will let you 
off easily if you just apologize sincerely～～

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
I cannot betray my aesthetics. 
—— Even be it a facade.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— Will you go… into the storm?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Umm, wouldn't it be better if you just 
don't break fences anymore……?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: We must be strong to live in this world… and life without beauty holds no meaning. Thus, "destruction" is my raison d'être ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
—— It looks like… you have 
accepted your fate.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Why does she go out of her way 
to destroy fences when she knows 
she'll get scolded……??)
